name: Ingrid and the Exalted Coven
description:
You are Ingrid the Intrepid, a powerful witch who has been challenged by the Exalted Coven, a coalition of nefarious, diabolical, and powerful wizards. Defeat them and claim your place as the greatest witch in the Exalted land, lose and live in shame under wizarding tyranny. Can you defeat them? Can you defeat Peregrin Vainglory, Malus Histrionis and his friend with boundary issues, and the cruel, despotic Kaiser FurFur Vandersocks III? Let's find out?

This game is a card game, and was developed by a small team as a first project. It was a wonderful learning experience. Thank you for visiting our page, and enjoy the game!
